DOC.brief_title: Prediction Preterm Deliveries Cervical Length Measurement With Embryo Transfer Catheter ICSI Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Cervical length measurement protocol : The physician insert sterile Collin vaginal speculum ; cervix expose gently clean sterile gauze pad . Cervical mucus gently remove syringe abundant . A nurse concomitantly perform transabdominal ultrasound scan . Estimated cervical length determine transfer procedure . The Sure View Wallace Embryo Replacement Catheter ( No . CE118 ; Smith Medical , Hythe , Kent , UK ) . There marked line surface catheter show distance half centimeter . The catheter slide guide fix external cervical o . Correct position catheter replace guide external o , guide 's endpoint internal cervical o . In relation internal o verify scan .
